articles.title: ESMAIL and MOIR: Canada’s health-care system costs patients in many ways
articles.description: Health-care costs for the average Canadian family have grown 1.6 times faster than the cost of housing, 2.2 times faster than the cost of food, and 1.6 times faster than its average income between 1997 and 2025. And yet, the health-care system itself has deteriorated.
